memberdef.name: GET_INITIAL_XSEC_PYTHIA
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(initialxsec_container& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ static SLHAstruct slha = *Dep::SpectrumAndDecaysForPythia; \ \ PerformInitialCrossSection_Pythia<PYTHIA_COLLIDER, PYTHIA_NS::Pythia8::Event>(result, slha, "", *runOptions); \ }

memberdef.name: GET_SPECIFIC_INITIAL_XSEC_PYTHIA
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(initialxsec_container& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ static SLHAstruct slha = *Dep::SpectrumAndDecaysForPythia; \ \ PerformInitialCrossSection_Pythia<PYTHIA_COLLIDER, PYTHIA_NS::Pythia8::Event>(result, slha, #MODEL_EXTENSION, *runOptions); \ }

memberdef.name: GET_PYTHIA_EVENT
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(PYTHIA_EVENT_TYPE &result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ generateEventPy8Collider(result, *Dep::RunMC, \ *Dep::HardScatteringSim, *Loop::iteration, \ Loop::wrapup, runOptions); \ \ } \ \ void CAT(NAME,_HEPUtils)(HEPUtils::Event& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::CAT(NAME,_HEPUtils); \ convertEventToHEPUtilsPy8Collider(result, \ *Dep::HardScatteringEvent, *Dep::HardScatteringSim, \ *Dep::EventWeighterFunction, *Loop::iteration, \ Loop::wrapup, runOptions); \ } \ \ IF_NOT_DEFINED(EXCLUDE_HEPMC, \ void CAT(NAME,_HepMC)(HepMC3::GenEvent& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::CAT(NAME,_HepMC); \ convertEventToHepMCPy8Collider(result, \ *Dep::HardScatteringEvent, *Dep::HardScatteringSim, \ *Loop::iteration, Loop::wrapup); \ } \ )

briefdescription.para: Generate a hard scattering event with a specific Pythia,.

detaileddescription.para: ColliderBit event loop functions returning collider Monte Carlo events.
